title: An Open Heart: A Story about Moritz
features: A story about kindness that I learned from Moritz.
description: "This"fresh" heartfelt story is the reminder that every child and adult needs in their library as a way to remember that sharing kindnesses with one another can change the world." --Ann D. Looby, Trauma Psychologist & President of Funding African Children's Education

Barry J. Schieber is a graduate of the University of California - Berkeley. "Nose to Nose" and "A Gift to Share" are also about Moritz his Bernese mountain dog. Moritz is a well known therapy dog. They live in Bigfork, Montana.
